meanings.definition: Making an action or process easier or more efficient.
meanings.sent1: The facilitative tools helped the students understand the lesson better.
meanings.sent2: The facilitative approach streamlined the project and saved time.
meanings.sent3: The facilitative calculator made math homework less stressful.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a facilitative light guiding us through the dark tunnel of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The facilitative teacher used visual aids to make learning fun and engaging.

meanings.definition: Acting as a facilitator or helper in a situation.
meanings.sent1: The facilitative friend always offered a helping hand when needed.
meanings.sent2: The facilitative volunteer guided the new employees through their tasks.
meanings.sent3: The facilitative cat brought the lost puppy back to its owner.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a facilitative bridge connecting the two conflicting parties.
meanings.sent5: The facilitative nurse comforted the patient during their recovery.
